messages.msgSnippet: Hi Richard, Just in case the following URL has the photos also. http://www.villagephotos.com/pubbrowse.asp?folder_id=1297670 Roger
messages.messageBody:
Hi Richard,

Just in case the following URL has the photos also.

http://www.villagephotos.com/pubbrowse.asp?folder_id=1297670

Roger

messages.subject: Mei Help Please
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, Can anyone help me out with this Mei?? It has me beat. The photos are in a folder called mei photos I m not sure how to attach it. Roger
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

Can anyone help me out with this Mei?? It has me beat.

The photos are in a folder called "mei photos" I'm not sure how to
attach it.

Roger

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Mei Help Please
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Richard, I ll put them up. Roger
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Richard, I'll put them up.

Roger

messages.msgSnippet: We need a picture Roger, you cannot link them to emails, you have to host them somewhere, like on this board. Rich ... -- Richard Turner Nihontô Message Board
messages.messageBody:
We need a picture Roger, you cannot link them to emails, you have to
host them somewhere, like on this board.

Rich
